Bushwhack.card_desc: [Quick Switch] Swapping to your Pistol grants {scale=10|10}% Lifesteal for 3s.

Cooled Mags.card_desc: [Quick Switch] Your inactive weapon generates {scale=2|2} Ammo every 1.5s.

Crack Shot.card_desc: [Weapon] Talon Rifle now applies an additional 50 damage over 3s to enemies hit, stacking up to 3 times and refreshing on hit, but you are now unable to get headshots.

Dexterous.card_desc: [Quick Switch] Reduce the time it takes to Quick Switch to your Pistol by {scale=10|10}%.

Escape Plan.card_desc: [Stealth] Heal for {scale=100|100} after entering Stealth at or below 65% Health.

Flare XL.card_desc: [Flare] Increase the area that Flare will Reveal enemies by {scale=10|10}%.

Guerrilla Tactics.card_desc: [Stealth] Generate {scale=15|15} Energy after getting an Elimination.

Infused Crystals.card_desc: [Weapon] Increase the maximum Ammo count of both your weapons by {scale=2|2}.

Nocturnal.card_desc: [Stealth] Reduce the rate of Stealth Energy consumption by 50%.

Relentless.card_desc: [Weapon] Reduce the Movement Speed penalty of Scope by {scale=20|20}%.

Resourceful.card_desc: [Quick Switch] While you have your Talon Rifle equipped, the Cooldown of Flare is reduced by {scale=0.2|0.2}s every 1s.

Roost.card_desc: [Scope] Hits with Talon Rifle generate {scale=1|1}% Ultimate charge.

Stalker.card_desc: [Stealth] Increase your Reload Speed by {scale=10|10}% while Stealth is active.

Tactical Retreat.card_desc: [Stealth] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=10|10}% for 2s after entering Stealth.

Trigger Control.card_desc: [Weapon] Reduce the maximum inaccuracy of your Pistol by {scale=8|8}%.

Unauthorized Use.card_desc: [Flare] Flare deals 250% base damage, has significantly increased Projectile Speed, and has its Cooldown reduced by 10s, but no longer Reveals enemies.

White Knuckle.card_desc: [Weapon] Reduce the recoil of your Pistol by {scale=6|6}%.

Abzugkontrolle.card_desc: [Waffe] Reduziert die maximale Ungenauigkeit deiner Pistole um {scale=8|8}%.

Dickicht.card_desc: [Schneller Wechsel] Wechselst du zu deiner Pistole, erhältst du 3s lang {scale=10|10}% Lebensraub.

Findig.card_desc: [Schneller Wechsel] Trägst du dein Klauengewehr, wird die Abklingzeit von Leuchtrakete pro Sekunde um {scale=0.2|0.2}s reduziert.

Fingerfertig.card_desc: [Schneller Wechsel] Reduziert die Wechselzeit zur Pistole um {scale=10|10}%.

Fluchtplan.card_desc: [Tarnung] Bei 65% oder weniger Gesundheit wirst du bei Aktivierung von Tarnung {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Gek\u00fchlte Magazine.card_desc: [Schneller Wechsel] Deine inaktive Waffe erzeugt alle 1,5s {scale=2|2} Munition.

Gr\u00e4ulich.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Hochspannend.card_desc: [Waffe] Reduziert den Rückstoß deiner Pistole um {scale=6|6}%.

Infundierte Kristalle.card_desc: [Waffe] Erhöht die Magazinkapazität deiner beiden Waffen um {scale=2|2}.

Nachtaktiv.card_desc: [Tarnung] Du verbrauchst während Tarnung 50% weniger Energie.

Pirschj\u00e4ger.card_desc: [Tarnung] Erhöht dein Nachladetempo während Tarnung um {scale=10|10}%.

Rast.card_desc: [Sucher] Treffer mit dem Klauengewehr laden die Überkraft um {scale=1|1}% auf.

Taktischer R\u00fcckzug.card_desc: [Tarnung] Nach Aktivierung von Tarnung erhöht sich dein Lauftempo 2s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

\u00dcberbrennung.card_desc: [Leuchtrakete] Erhöht die Dauer von Leuchtrakete um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Unbarmherzig.card_desc: [Waffe] Reduziert die Verlangsamung durch Sucher um {scale=20|20}%.

Unerlaubte Nutzung.card_desc: [Leuchtrakete] Erhöht den Schaden von Leuchtrakete auf 250% des Grundschadens, erhöht die Projektilgeschwindigkeit erheblich und reduziert die Abklingzeit um 10s. Offenbart dafür keine Gegner mehr.

XL-Leuchtrakete.card_desc: [Leuchtrakete] Vergrößert den Offenbarungsbereich von Leuchtrakete um {scale=10|10}%.

Zielsch\u00fctze.card_desc: [Waffe] Schüsse mit dem Klauengewehr fügen Zielen nun über 3s weitere 50 Schaden zu (bis zu 3 Stapel, werden bei Treffern zurückgesetzt), aber deine Kopfschüsse verursachen keinen Bonusschaden mehr.

Acharn\u00e9.card_desc: [Arme] La pénalité de vitesse avec Lunette diminue de {scale=20|20}%.

Br\u00fblure intense.card_desc: [Fusée éclairante] Fusée éclairante dure {scale=0.6|0.6}s de plus.

Chargeurs refroidis.card_desc: [Alternance] L'arme inactive regagne {scale=2|2} munitions toutes les 1,5s.

Cristaux infus\u00e9s.card_desc: [Arme] Chaque arme a {scale=2|2} munitions de plus.

Demande d'extraction.card_desc: [Camouflage] Quand vous avez moins de 65% de PV, activer Camouflage vous rend {scale=100|100} PV.

Dext\u00e9rit\u00e9.card_desc: [Alternance] Le délai pour dégainer le pistolet diminue de {scale=10|10}%.

Fus\u00e9e XL.card_desc: [Fusée éclairante] Le rayon de détection de Fusée éclairante augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

G\u00e2chette rapide.card_desc: [Arme] Le fusil Talon inflige aussi 50 dégâts supplémentaire en 3s, mais vos tirs dans la tête n'infligent plus de dégâts bonus. Effet cumulable 3 fois, réinitialisé à chaque coup.

Gu\u00e9rillero.card_desc: [Camouflage] Chaque élimination vous redonne {scale=15|15} de ressource de camouflage.

Nocturne.card_desc: [Camouflage] Vous consommez moitié moins de ressource de camouflage.

Perchoir.card_desc: [Lunette] Réussir un tir de fusil donne {scale=1|1}% de charge d'ultime.

Pisteur.card_desc: [Camouflage] Votre vitesse de rechargement augmente de {scale=10|10}% quand vous êtes camouflé.

Plein de ressources.card_desc: [Alternance] Le temps de recharge de Fusée éclairante diminue de {scale=0.2|0.2}s chaque seconde tant que le fusil est dégainé.

Prise ferme.card_desc: [Arme] Le recul du pistolet diminue de {scale=6|6}%.

Repli strat\u00e9gique.card_desc: [Camouflage] Votre vitesse augmente de {scale=10|10}% pendant 2s après l'activation de Camouflage.

Stabilit\u00e9.card_desc: [Arme] L'imprécision maximale du pistolet diminue de {scale=8|8}%.

Traquenard.card_desc: [Alternance] Vous avez {scale=10|10}% de drain de vie pendant 3s après avoir dégainé votre pistolet.

Utilisation non conforme.card_desc: [Fusée éclairante] La Fusée éclairante inflige 250% de dégâts de plus, se recharge 10s plus vite et sa vitesse augmente, mais elle ne révèle pas les ennemis.

\u4e0d\u5c48\u4e0d\u6320.card_desc: [高倍瞄准镜] 减少开镜状态下的移动速度衰减{scale=20|20}%

\u4e1b\u6797\u4f0f\u51fb.card_desc: [快速切换] 切换至手枪的3秒内会获得{scale=10|10}%生命偷取

\u5145\u80fd\u6c34\u6676.card_desc: [武器] 两种武器的弹药数量增加{scale=2|2}发

\u51b7\u5374\u5f39\u5939.card_desc: [快速切换] 每过1.5秒，你未激活的武器获得{scale=2|2} 颗弹药

\u591c\u884c\u8005.card_desc: [潜行] 潜行能量槽消耗减少50%

\u5927\u53f7\u7167\u660e\u5f39.card_desc: [照明弹] 照明弹的显形范围增加{scale=10|10}%

\u5feb\u67aa\u624b.card_desc: [武器]被狙击枪命中的目标在4秒内受到手枪的伤害提高20%。

\u6218\u7565\u64a4\u9000.card_desc: [潜行] 进入潜行状态的2秒内增加{scale=10|10}%的移动速度

\u6273\u673a\u63a7\u5236.card_desc: [武器] 副武器的散射效果降低{scale=8|8}%

\u6816\u606f.card_desc: [高倍瞄准镜] 开镜状态下静止不动时，减少{scale=6|6}%潜行能量的消耗

\u6e38\u51fb\u6218\u672f.card_desc: [潜行] 消灭敌人会获取{scale=15|15}点潜行能量

\u6ee5\u7528\u519b\u706b.card_desc: [照明弹] 照明弹的弹道速度增加100，伤害增加300%，冷却时间减少10秒

\u7075\u5de7.card_desc: [快速切换] 切换至副武器的时间减少{scale=20|20}%

\u767d\u6307\u5173\u8282.card_desc: [武器] 副武器后坐力减少{scale=6|6}%

\u8fc7\u5ea6\u71c3\u70e7.card_desc: [照明弹] 照明弹的显形持续时间增加{scale=0.6|0.6}秒

\u8ffd\u8e2a\u8005.card_desc: [潜行] 潜行状态下武器装填速度增加{scale=10|10}%

\u9003\u8131\u8ba1\u5212.card_desc: [潜行] 血量低于65%时进入潜行会恢复{scale=100|100}点生命

\u968f\u673a\u5e94\u53d8.card_desc: [快速切换] 当前使用狙击枪时，每秒照明弹冷却减少{scale=0.2|0.2}秒

Asechador.card_desc: [Sigilo] Tu velocidad de recarga aumenta un {scale=10|10}% mientras Sigilo está activo.

Aterrador.card_desc: [Arma] Se reduce el retroceso de tu Pistola un {scale=6|6}%.

Bengala XL.card_desc: [Bengala] El área en la que Bengala revela a los enemigos aumenta un {scale=10|10}%.

Control del gatillo.card_desc: [Arma] Se reduce la inexactitud máxima de tu Pistola un {scale=8|8}%.

Cristales infundidos.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta la cantidad de munición máxima de tus dos armas en {scale=2|2}.

Desma\u00f1a.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=50|50} PS.

Diestro.card_desc: [Cambio rápido] Se reduce el tiempo que tardas en cambiar a tu Pistola con Cambio rápido un {scale=10|10}%.

Incesante.card_desc: [Arma] Se reduce la sanción de velocidad de movimiento de Mira un {scale=20|20}%

Ingenioso.card_desc: [Cambio Rápido] La recarga de bengala se reduce en {scale=0.2|0.2}s cada 1s mientras tengas equipado el Rifle de garras.

Mags recargadas.card_desc: [Cambio rápido] Recuperas {scale=2|2} de munición cada 1,5s para el arma que no esté activa.

Matorral.card_desc: [Cambio rápido] Cambiar a tu pistola te otorga {scale=10|10}% de robo de vida durante 3s.

Nocturno.card_desc: [Sigilo] Se reduce el ritmo de consumo de energía de sigilo un 50%.

Percha.card_desc: [Mira] Alcanzar a enemigos con Rifle de garras recarga la habilidad definitiva un {scale=1|1}%.

Plan de escape.card_desc: [Sigilo] Te curas {scale=100|100} PS al entrar en Sigilo con el 65% o menos de salud.

Retracci\u00f3n t\u00e1ctica.card_desc: [Sigilo] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=10|10}% durante 2s cuando entras en Sigilo.

T\u00e1cticas guerrilleras.card_desc: [Sigilo] Recuperas {scale=15|15} de energía tras obtener una eliminación.

Tirador experto.card_desc: [Arma] Rifle de garras aplica ahora 50 PS de daño adicionales durante 3s a los enemigos alcanzados, acumulándose hasta 3 veces y refrescándose al golpear, pero no podrás conseguir tiros a la cabeza.

Uso No Autorizado.card_desc: [Bengala] Bengala inflige un 250% más de daño básico, aumenta significativamente su velocidad de proyectil y se reduce su recarga en 10s, pero ya no revela enemigos.

Boa Articula\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Arma] Reduz o coice da Pistola de apoio em {scale=6|6}%.

Cartuchos Inativos.card_desc: [Troca Rápida] Sua arma inativa gera {scale=2|2} de munição a cada 1,5s.

Cheio de Destreza.card_desc: [Troca Rápida] Reduz em {scale=10|10}% o tempo da Troca Rápida para a Pistola.

Cheio de Recursos.card_desc: [Troca Rápida] Enquanto você estiver usando o Riflo Tático, o intervalo do Sinalizador é reduzido em {scale=0.2|0.2}s a cada 1s.

Controle do Gatilho.card_desc: [Arma] Reduz a falta de precisão máxima da pistola de apoio em {scale=8|8}%.

Cristais Infundidos.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta a quantidade máxima de munição de ambas as armas em {scale=2|2}.

Embrenhado.card_desc: [Troca Rápida] Trocar para a Pistola te dá {scale=10|10}% de roubo de vida por 3s.

Envelhecido.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a sua vida máxima em {scale=50|50}.

Incans\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Arma] Reduz em {scale=20|20}% a penalidade causada pela Luneta à velocidade de movimento.

Not\u00edvago.card_desc: [Furtividade] Reduz em 50% a taxa de consumo da energia da Furtividade.

Perseguidor.card_desc: [Furtividade] Você recarrega a arma {scale=10|10}% mais rápido enquanto Furtividade estiver ativa.

Plano de Fuga.card_desc: [Furtividade] Se cura em {scale=100|100} de vida após entrar em Furtividade se estiver com 65% ou menos de vida.

Puleiro.card_desc: [Luneta] Cada acerto com o Rifle Tático carrega {scale=1|1}% da sua suprema.

Retirada T\u00e1tica.card_desc: [Furtividade] Aumenta a velocidade de movimento em {scale=10|10}% durante 2s ao entrar em Furtividade.

Sinalizador GG.card_desc: [Sinalizador] Aumenta em {scale=10|10}% a área em que o Sinalizador revela os inimigos.

T\u00e1ticas de Guerrilha.card_desc: [Furtividade] Gera {scale=15|15} de energia de Furtividade após conseguir uma eliminação.

Tiro de Ataque.card_desc: [Arma] Rifle Tático agora aplica um adicional de 50 de dano no decorrer de 3s nos inimigos atingidos, estocando até 3 vezes e reiniciando ao ser atingido, mas você não consegue mais dar tiros na cabeça.

Uso N\u00e3o Autorizado.card_desc: [Sinalizador] O Sinalizador causa 250% mais dano base, a velocidade do projétil é muito maior e tem o intervalo reduzido em 10s, mas não revela mais inimigos.

\u0412\u0441\u043f\u044b\u0448\u043a\u04.card_desc: [Вспышка] Радиус обнаружения цели Вспышкой увеличивается на {scale=10|10}%.

\u0417\u0430\u043f\u0430\u0441\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Быстрый выбор] Каждые 1,5 с. неактивное оружие генерирует {scale=2|2} ед. боеприпасов.

\u041c\u0435\u0442\u043a\u0438\u0439 \u0.card_desc: [Оружие] Винтовка "Коготь" теперь дополнительно наносит пораженным врагам 50 ед. урона в течение 3 с. Этот эффект суммируется до 3 раз и обновляется при последующих попаданиях, но вы больше не сможете совершать попадания в голову.

\u041d\u0430\u043b\u0435\u0442.card_desc: [Быстрый выбор] Вы получаете {scale=10|10}% вампиризма на 3 с. при переключении на пистолет.

\u041d\u0430\u0441\u0435\u0441\u0442.card_desc: [Прицел] Попадания из винтовки "Коготь" заряжают суперудар на {scale=1|1}%.

\u041d\u0430\u0445\u043e\u0434\u0447\u04.card_desc: [Быстрый выбор] Когда вы вооружены винтовкой "Коготь", перезарядка Вспышки сокращается на {scale=0.2|0.2} с. каждую секунду.

\u041d\u0435\u043f\u0440\u0435\u043a\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Во время использования Прицела штраф к скорости передвижения снижается на {scale=20|20}%.

\u041d\u0421\u0414.card_desc: [Вспышка] Скорость снаряда Вспышки значительно повышается, и она наносит 250% базового урона. Перезарядка Вспышки сокращается на 10 с., но она больше не раскрывает местоположение врагов.

\u041f\u043b\u0430\u043d \u043f\u043e\u0.card_desc: [Скрытность] Переход в режим скрытности при уровне здоровья 65% и ниже исцеляет вас на {scale=100|100} ед.

\u041f\u0440\u043e\u043d\u0438\u0437\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Максимальный боезапас всего вашего оружия повышается на {scale=2|2} ед.

\u0421\u0435\u0434\u0438\u043d\u0430.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u0421\u043d\u043e\u0440\u043e\u0432\u04.card_desc: [Быстрый выбор] Вы переключаетесь на пистолет на {scale=10|10}% быстрее.

\u0421\u0442\u0430\u043b\u043a\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Скрытность] Пока действует Скрытность, ваша скорость перезарядки повышается на {scale=10|10}%.

\u0422\u0430\u043a\u0442\u0438\u0447\u04.card_desc: [Скрытность] Скорость передвижения при переходе в режим скрытности повышается на {scale=10|10}% на 2 с.

Ch\u0142odne magazynki.card_desc: [Szybka zamiana] Twoja nieaktywna broń wytwarza {scale=2|2} szt. amunicji co 1,5 s.

Flara XL.card_desc: [Flara] Zwiększa o {scale=10|10}% obszar ujawniania wrogów przez Rozbłysk.

Instynkt buszu.card_desc: [Szybka zamiana] Wydobycie Pistoletu zapewnia {scale=10|10}% kradzieży życia na 3 s.

Kontrola spustu.card_desc: [Broń] Zmniejsza o {scale=8|8}% maks. niecelność twojego Pistoletu.

Kryszta\u0142y weny.card_desc: [Broń] Zwiększa limit amunicji dla obu broni o {scale=2|2} szt.

Nieuprawnione u\u017cycie.card_desc: [Flara] Flara zadaje 250% obrażeń bazowych, szybkość jej pocisków zostaje znacząco zwiększona, a czas odnowienia skrócony o 10 s, ale nie ujawnia już ukrytych wrogów.

Niewzruszony.card_desc: [Broń] Zmniejsza karę do szybkości ruchu dla Lunety o {scale=20|20}%.

Nocne \u017cycie.card_desc: [Ukrycie] Zmniejsza tempo zużycia energii Ukrycia o 50%.

Odwr\u00f3t taktyczny.card_desc: [Ukrycie] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 2 s po wejściu w Ukrycie.

Osiwia\u0142y.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=50|50} PZ.

Plan ucieczki.card_desc: [Ukrycie] Przywraca {scale=100|100} PZ, jeśli wejdziesz w Ukrycie mając nie więcej niż 65% zdrowia.

Pomys\u0142owo\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Szybka zamiana] Kiedy masz na wyposażeniu Karabin, czas odnowienia Flary co 1 s zostaje skrócony o {scale=0.2|0.2} s.

Prze\u015bladowca.card_desc: [Ukrycie] Zwiększa o {scale=10|10}% szybkość przeładowania podczas Ukrycia.

Rewolwerowiec.card_desc: [Szybka zamiana] Skraca czas Szybkiej zamiany na Pistolet o {scale=10|10}%.

Sokoli wzrok.card_desc: [Broń] Karabin zadaje teraz dodatkowo 50 obrażeń w ciągu 3 s trafionym wrogom. Efekt kumuluje się 3 razy i odświeża po trafieniu, jednak tracisz możliwość trafienia w głowę.

Ek Yak\u0131t.card_desc: [İşaret Fişeği] İşaret Fişeği {scale=0.6|0.6}sn daha uzun sürer.

Eli \u00c7abuk.card_desc: [Hızlı Değiştirme] Yedek Silah'ına geçiş süresini %{scale=10|10} azalt.

Gerilla Takti\u011fi.card_desc: [Gizlenme] Bir Saf Dışı Bırakma yaptıktan sonra {scale=15|15} Enerji üret.

G\u00fc\u00e7 Dolu Kristaller.card_desc: [Silah] Her iki silahının da cephane sayısını {scale=2|2} artır.

\u0130\u015f Bilen.card_desc: [Hızlı Değiştirme] Pusucu Tüfeği'ni kuşanmışken İşaret Fişeği'nin Bekleme Süresi her 1 saniyede {scale=0.2|0.2}sn azalır.

\u0130\u015faret Fi\u015fe\u011fi XL.card_desc: [İşaret Fişeği] İşaret Fişeği'nin düşmanı Açığa Çıkarma alanını %{scale=10|10} artır.

Ka\u00e7\u0131\u015f Plan\u0131.card_desc: [Gizlenme] %65 Canın altında iken gizlenmeye girdiğinde {scale=100|100} Can iyileş.

Keskin Ni\u015fanc\u0131.card_desc: [Silah] Pusucu Tüfeği vurduğu düşmanlara 3 saniyede ek 50 hasar verir, 3 defaya kadar birikebilir ve vuruşta yenilenir ancak kafadan vurma yapamazsın.

Pusuda.card_desc: [Hızlı Değiştirme] Tabancanı almak 3 sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} Can Çalma verir.

So\u011futmal\u0131 \u015earj\u00f6r.card_desc: [Hızlı Değiştirme] Etkin olmayan silahın her 1,5 saniyede {scale=2|2} Cephane üretir.

Takip\u00e7i.card_desc: [Gizlenme] Gizlenme etkinken Yeniden Doldurma Hızını %{scale=10|10} artır.

Taktik \u00c7ekilme.card_desc: [Gizlenme] Gizlenmeye girdikten sonra 2sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} Hareket Hızı kazan.

Tetik Kontrol\u00fc.card_desc: [Silah] Yedek Silah'ının maksimum doğruluktan sapmasını %{scale=8|8} azalt.

T\u00fcneme.card_desc: [Dürbün] Pusucu Tüfeği ile yapılan vuruşlar Ultiyi %{scale=1|1} doldurur.
